forum.content:
I became the color
I become the daughter and the son

我化為顏色 我投身為兒女
When the feast is over
當盛宴結束
Welcome to another one
迎接另一次的開端

 
Lay my body down down
Down upon the water
躺下軀殼 沉入沉入
我沉入水底深處
Wrapped up in the clothes of my mother and my father
用父親、母親的衣物包裹我的軀體
OH this is longing
噢，這就是渴望
I want to be complete
讓我完整吧
I was waiting round in a little jump seat
我曾在那等待著，在小小的後車廂附近
I had a hunger
我飢餓著
A mouthful of interludes
一點點的間奏
You'll do anything just to get rescued
你將不顧一切 只為得到救贖
I had longing
我渴望的
Isn't that the key
不就是這個嗎
Take take taste taste sweet
拿吧 拿吧 品嘗 品嘗 品嘗吧 多甜美
They said I'd gone south
他們說我會成熟
I'd gone asunder
他們說我將碎散
They don't know hunger or what I been under
他們不懂飢餓或是不懂我的壓抑
They were all laughing
他們全笑著
Thought i was debris
笑我是散落的殘骸

I was just free
而我自由了

urls.description: Please read. SOURCES FOR THE LYRICS (these sites are official) : - https://soundcloud.com/emilywells
urls.title: Emily Wells - Becomes the Colour (lyric video)

forum.title: become the color
